ca.uwaterloo.epad.xml

Class SimpleMarshaller

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwaterloo.epad.xml.SimpleMarshaller

  • public class SimpleMarshaller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles saving and loading the workspace layout as well as loading the GUI layout. It handles subclasses of MoveableItem class automatically, saving and loading the basic parameters (x, y, width, height, drawerId, image, transformation matrix and class name) as well as all extra fields that are marked with XmlAttribute annotation.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dmitry Pyryeskin
